title: Stanley Bagshaw And The Fourteen-foot Wheel
description: When loveable duffer Stanley Bagshaw is asked to watch the wheel-making machine at the Huddersgate foundry he eagerly agrees. Chaos ensues when a bored Stanley falls asleep sending a 14-foot wheel careening through the town. Colorful pictures and amusing rhyming couplets make this charming tale an enchanting and useful tool for early readers.
author: Bob  Wilson
